card.name: PTI Student 1
card.description: "A first year university student who do anything for a decree. Unfortunately the actual studying is an exception."

card.name: PTI Student 2
card.description: "An university student who had exceptional sense for programing, but has difficulties with Maths."

card.name: PTI Student 3
card.description: "A third university student. Hopefully this is his last year."

card.name: PTI Student 4
card.description: "A third year university student for a second time. Not sure if it is the last..."

card.name: PTI Student 5
card.description: "A brilliant third year university student. Only one step away from the diploma."

card.name: Discrete Mathematics 1
card.description: The students needs to have 10 or more commutative power to complete this course

card.name: Calculus 1
card.description: The students needs to have 10 or more commutative power to complete this course

card.name: Logic in Computer Science
card.description: The students needs to have 15 or more commutative power to complete this course

card.name: Introduction to Informatics
card.description: The students needs to have 5 or more commutative power to complete this course

card.name: Computer Architectures
card.description: The students needs to have 8 or more commutative power to complete this course

card.name: Laptop
card.description: Add 3 attack and 2 defense to the owner

card.name: Personal computer
card.description: Add 1 attack and 2 defense to the owner

card.name: Coffee
card.description: Add 2 attack to the owner for a turn but reduce it by 1 for the next two turn

card.name: Energy Drink
card.description: Add 3 attack to the owner but reduce it to 0 for the next two turn

card.name: Quick test
card.description: Every student whose defense is less than 2 cannot participate on the next turn

card.name: The alarm doesn't work
card.description: Every student whose defense is less than 3 cannot participate on the next turn
